Description
Here's a new +16 trainer for the game Far Cry 3


By using this brand new trainer you'll get infinite health, infinite armor, infinite stamina, infinite oxygen, unlimited ammo, no reload, unlimited explosives, 8x experience points, unlimited skill points, fast vehicle repair and other great cheats.
